subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic gold medalist in the 100-meter dash, is undergoing a physical rejuvenation and an emotional resurgence after a four-year drug ban.
snippet: Justin Gatlin, the 2004 Olympic gold medalist in the 100-meter dash, is undergoing a physical rejuvenation and an emotional resurgence after a four-year drug ban.
